argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pwsms.y | |- Y = ( R ^s I ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` R ) = ( Scalar ` R ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_pwsval | |- ( ( R e. *MetSp /\ I e. Fin ) -> Y = ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Scalar ` R ) e. _V |
| 5 | 4 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( R e. *MetSp /\ I e. Fin ) -> ( Scalar ` R ) e. _V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( R e. *MetSp /\ I e. Fin ) -> I e. Fin ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fconst6g | |- ( R e. *MetSp -> ( I X. { R } ) : I --> *MetSp ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. *MetSp /\ I e. Fin ) -> ( I X. { R } ) : I --> *MetSp ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) = ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_prdsxms | |- ( ( ( Scalar ` R ) e. _V /\ I e. Fin /\ ( I X. { R } ) : I --> *MetSp ) -> ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) e. *MetSp ) |
| 11 | 5, 6, 8, 10 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( R e. *MetSp /\ I e. Fin ) -> ( ( Scalar ` R ) Xs_ ( I X. { R } ) ) e. *MetSp ) |
| 12 | 3, 11 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( R e. *MetSp /\ I e. Fin ) -> Y e. *MetSp ) |
